sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Drop table_field unique index in sys_highlighted_value </description>
        <name>Drop sys_highlighted_value unque index </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[dropTableFieldIndex();
function dropTableFieldIndex() {
	var td = GlideTableDescriptor.get("sys_highlighted_value");
	if (!td.isValid())
		return;
	var ids = td.getIndexDescriptors();
	if (!ids)
		return;
	var idValues = ids.values().iterator();
	while (idValues.hasNext()) {
		var id = idValues.next();
		if (!id.isUnique())
			continue;
		var idFields = id.getFields();
		if (!idFields || idFields.size() != 2)
			continue;
		if (idFields.contains('table') && idFields.contains('field')) {
			gs.log('Found "table_field" unique index, proceed to drop it');
			new GlideIndexUtils().drop(id);
			return;
		}
	}
	gs.log('"table_field" unique index not found, no index dropped');
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-23 18:31:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a472b048c7233300cff9337bf4c2600d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Drop sys_highlighted_value unque index </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Highlighted Values" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.highlighted_values">43fa7c203c35311068bcf327dfe37f61</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a472b048c7233300cff9337bf4c2600d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-26 23:18:14</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
